TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: I JUST ANNOYED EVERY FAN BASE BY OVER POSTING!!! Including this one.

Apple uses child labor and horribly unsafe and inhumane work conditions.

 

Sorry, Scott Manley.
Kefka > Sephiroth

Life is Strange had a crappy sound track, and there wasn't any emotion. 0/10.

 

(Internally cringing as I am typing this)
Don't care just don't cars xDr
Ponies are dumb
Minecraft is the best game, obviously.
FNAF sucks

In the words of the great Spok: May the Force be with you, and the odds ever in your favor.

(3-in-1 combo!)

To KSP players: Do a barrel roll!

To Starfox players: Do an aileron roll!

How to annoy anyone who watches YouTube:

In the words of the great Markiplier: But hey, SPEED IS KEY, fly safe.

(4-in-1!)

I like being offensive... Is that bad?

3 hours ago, TheKosanianMethod said:

May the Force be with you, and the odds ever in your favor.

May the Force be ever in your favor?

The Rocky Horror Picture Show was lame
Dres is a boring hunk of rock.

19 minutes ago, CliftonM said:

Dres is a boring hunk of rock.

You didn't offend many people there...  it's just that the few who are tend to be rather verbose about it.

The whole Kraken vs. Dres thing is stupid.

*runs and grabs popcorn*

ARE YOU KIDDING ME CRAZY TRAIN GUY AND GUY IN MY HOUSE?!?

HERE: ALL DRES HATERS DESERVE TO BE DEFENESTRATED OFF OCTAN TOWER!!!

7 minutes ago, max_creative said:

!

 

See? Verbose.

"Dres isn't a mop because mops are real!" jk, I know Dres is real. I've been here like twice!

Edited May 18, 2016 by cubinator
Thank you, @max_creative, you just invited this thread to be locked down.

Avatar is my favorite anime

Im an animal lover, they taste great

why do proffesional wrestlers need donations? And why do they sometimes use a panda logo?

If it costs more, it must be better

Capitalism is an efficient method of getting goods and services to the people who need them

Continuos growth is a sustainable economic strategy

The final season of battlestar galactica was awesome and didnt feel rushed at all

I just bought a starwars box set, episodes 1 through seven.

Edited May 18, 2016 by SinBad
added a 't'

A Su-35 can easily beat an F-22A.

A MiG-29A is more maneuverable than an F/A-18C.

The F-35 is/will be an awesome fighter (+optional: is better/more advanced than the F-22A).

[some fighter jet] is better than [some other fighter jet]

[some fighter jet] is superior in this way because it has [some random component/technology]

 

To those who aren't particularly interested in Air Combat, those are bombshells in the right forum. The combinations and direction of comparison are not relevant.

I think KSP is too realistic.

Or

I think KSP is too cartoony and unrealistic. 

Also

People take dres too seriously (that was not a thread entry).

825-987/874% ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED

All replica builders are dum! In a sandbox game where you can build ALMOST ANYTHING you want, you choose to build things that have already been built before! You're taking a game specifically meant for creativity and sucking the creativity right out of it!

And don't even get me started on the realism community, pretending that your achievements in a video game are worth paying attention to because you wasted more time and energy on doing things that are less significant. Not only that, but you're all so biased! You care about the firkin angular drag model in this game you've wasted your life playing, yet you're somehow able to overlook that fact that the x-wing's deployable wings are useless, or that the Enterprise's engines are unbalanced given its center of mass, or that Star Citizen's fighter methods of strafing around like air fighters have no practicality!

 

Im so sorry please no kill...

Edited May 18, 2016 by quasarrgames

Im so sorry please no kill...

Oh. Ok then.

I hate memes. Dat boi? C'mon, learn English! Since when did the world become interested in depressed cartoon frogs? I think we should ban the internets, because all these 'trends' are ruining these poor people's thumbs. Everyone should go out and play some good ol stick and ball, rather than laugh at a picture of a cat that is 'funny'.
